name: Unibros Technologies
overview:
Unibros is adept in providing solutions that encompass Information Technology, Business Process Outsourcing & Transcription services. Our services are highly customized to each client business model and their needs.

Core Services:

  • Web Development:

    • Website design & development.
    • E-Commerce Solutions.
    • Social Networking Sites.
    • Content Management System.

    • Search Engine Optimization (SEO).

      • Application Development & Maintenance:
    • Application Development.
    • Application Integration.
    • Application Migration.
    • Application Maintenance.

  • Process Outsourcing:

    • Voice : Technical support Services, Answering Service, Customer Service, Toll Free Service, Help Desk Support, Remote Receptionist, Inquiry handling, Appointment Scheduling, E-Mail follow-up, Market Research & Survey, Product / Service Promotion.
